title: Throwback Incredible Astrazeneca Carnival
summary: Throwback to an incredible day with AstraZeneca! From the Carnival Claw to our wild inflatables, the fun didn t stop. Laughter, games, and good vibes all around as everyone jumped, played, and celebrated together in the sun!
